author: DANICA KIRKA / AP
title: Queen Elizabeth II: History Will Remember Your Actions in the COVID-19 Pandemic
description: In a rare address to the nation, Queen Elizabeth II plans to exhort Britons to rise to the challenge of the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
In a rare address to the nation, Queen Elizabeth II plans to exhort Britons to rise to the challenge of the coronavirus pandemic, drawing on wisdom from her decades as Britain’s head of state to urge discipline and resolve in a time of crisis.
